hoatChat: Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) 125IU;  Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxin HCl) 5mg;  Magnesi (Magnesi oxyd) 40mg; Kẽm (Kẽm oxyd) 5mg; Đồng (Đồng gluconat) 0,5mg;  Boron (Natri tetraborat decahydrat) 0,5mg;  Mangan (Mangan gluconat dihydrat) 0,5mg; Calci (Calci citrat) 250mg
dongGoi: Hộp 10 vỉ x 10 viên; hộp 1 chai 30 viên
